channel.title: canoeing on Peaks and Plains
channel.description: Recent content in canoeing on Peaks and Plains

item.title: Lakeland Canoe Circuit
item.description: Date: 2020-09-03 to 2020-09-06 Location: Lakeland Provincial Park Friends: Greg, Ingrid, Kat My first canoe trip was a great experience. The four of us headed to Lakeland Provincial Park near Lac La Biche on the Thursday before Labour Day weekend. We completed Alberta’s only canoe circuit in four leisurely days and it was perfect. The weather was quite mild and we barely saw any people the entire time. The good… I enjoyed waking up at 7 am every morning to catch the sunrise over the water.
